verses.text: Yo, this is the Word God dropped through Joel, son of Pethuel. Listen up.
Squad, pay attention! Elders, ancestors, all y’all — hear this prophecy, take notes.
Has anything like this ever gone down in your days, or your dads’? Spread the word to your kids.
Locust apocalypse incoming: the palmerworm, the cankerworm, the caterpillar, the locust — all swooped in, devouring everything. Nothing left.
Vines? Stripped. Fig trees? Gone. Pomegranate trees? Eaten. Fruit? Canceled. Pure chaos.
Hops, grain, barley, corn, olive trees — destroyed. Fields empty. Farmers crying.
Yo, priests! Sound the alarm in Zion! Trumpets up! People, brace yourselves — God’s judgment flex incoming.
Day of the Lord approaching. Land shaking. Fire consuming. Total end-of-days energy.
Meat and drink offerings? Gone. Temple vibes? Dead. Priests, you gotta mourn.
Wail, farmers! Beat your chest in sackcloth. Grain, wine, oil? Gone. Joy? Deleted.
Fields ruined, vines burned, trees stripped. Life groaning. Earth literally shook.
Seed shriveled under the sun. Farmers weep. Vintners mourn. Total loss.
Vine dried. Fig trees withered. Pomegranate trees wrecked. Fruit? Nada.
Alert in the holy spot! God’s wrath is real, landing heavy. No cap.
Blow the trumpet in Zion! Day of the Lord near. Darkness, gloom, clouds of doom.
Nation, panic! Hide in caves! Scatter! Land convulsing. Big chaos.
Animals groaning, flocks suffering. Birds starving. Fish panicking. Nature in total meltdown.
Rivers dried. Streams vanished. Land crying. Earth mourning. God’s wrath on full flex.
People, pay attention! God’s anger is real. Repent and return before it hits harder.
Grain gone, offerings cut, joy deleted — sing to God! Humble yourselves, call for mercy, save what’s left.
Yo, blow the trumpet loud in Zion! Alarm in God’s squad – Day of the Lord is rolling in mad fast.
Terrifying energy: Lord’s army charging, nothing chill about it, darkness covers the skies, fire in front, smoke behind.
Like warriors, running hard, teeth like lions, jaws flexing, devouring everything.
Faces fierce, like flames, moving fast, causing chaos everywhere.
Columns of smoke, land shaking, nothing stands in their path.
Their army moves like cavalry, teeth chomping, teeth gnashing, destruction nonstop.
They crush everything underfoot; human squads panic, animals scatter.
Behind them, land is wasted, fields devoured, cities crumble, no chill left.
Nothing can hide – walls fall, windows smashed, people flee.
Earth quakes before them, mountains shake, rivers dry, fire burns.
God thunders from Zion, Heaven flexes, troops shake. His army is unstoppable.
Squad, return! Fast, repent, heart, soul, spirit – all in, no cap.
Priests, nation, cry out; beat your chest, sackcloth on, God sees your grind.
The Lord is merciful, slow to anger, huge love – maybe He’ll chill wrath.
Blow the trumpet, Zion! Holy fast, all hands on deck, day is near.
Call for assembly, nation squad, priests unite – repentance flex incoming.
Even newlyweds, old and young, call for mercy, God is watching.
Show mercy, Lord! Don’t cancel us; flex your love over wrath.
Restore land, bless the squad – give back the vibe and life.
Northern army removed; destruction stopped – hope unlocked.
Farmers rejoice: seed, wine, oil, flocks restored; land vibes alive again.
Animals chill, birds feed, all creation rejoices – God’s flex fully revealed.
Celebrate, Zion! Praise God for mercy and restoration.
God repays for lost years, locusts, cankerworms, caterpillars, stripping crops – blessings incoming.
Eat, be full, praise God; squad restored, no cap.
Fear Him, worship Him, call His name; His love is epic, unshakable.
God will pour His Spirit on everyone – youth, old, boys, girls – visions, dreams, prophecy.
Even servants get the Spirit; no exclusions. Power unlocked, fully infinite.
Before the final day: sun darkens, moon blood-red, stars dropping, heavens shaking.
The Day of the Lord comes; cannot dodge it, all see, all feel, total apocalypse vibe.
Call for mercy, stand tall; God’s justice and love combined, total squad flex.
Blessed squad trusts Him — land restored, life blessed, peace unlocked; God flexes forever.
Yo, God says, “I’m pulling the squad from exile; I’ll bring them back and judge Judah’s enemies.”
I’ll gather all nations, drag them to the valley of decision – my showdown spot.
You, Tyre, Sidon, and all the coastal squad, I’m coming for you. You sold My people; cash and trade, but I saw.
I’ll stretch My hand over you, strip your wealth, and make you solo – no chill, no flex left.
I’ll turn your trading spots into rubble, your ports empty, no ships docking – chaos incoming.
You thought you got away selling My squad? Nah, God sees, justice incoming.
I’ll judge your deals, punish your squad; everyone who harmed Israel, face the wrath.
Watch out, nations: I’m bringing blood, fire, devastation – My vengeance squad activated.
Swing the sickle, Lord! Harvest is ready, the clusters of grapes are ripe for judgment.
Beat the plowshares into swords, farming tools into weapons – God’s battle is coming.
Nations, assemble! I’ll summon everyone to the valley for war; no hiding.
Multitudes die; the sun burns, the moon darkens – God’s wrath is real, no cap.
The elders, the princes, everyone trembles before His throne; God flexes holy power.
Listen, nations: scatter My people no more, treat them right – My eyes are on you.
God’s squad will rule; He’ll settle the land, give the right vibes to His people.
Judah, don’t stress; God’s coming, mighty in power, He fights for you.
Streams in Judah will flow; cities restored; My squad gets back what was lost.
Egypt, Edom, the squad nearby, fear! God’s vengeance rolls; you’ll pay for your moves.
God roars from Zion; His voice shakes the nations; His squad is untouchable.
Judah, rejoice! God is in the squad, no enemy can touch you; blessings unlocked.
God’s name forever praised in Zion; His glory covers the land, squad secure, no cap.
